title: Two elaborately landscaped roof decks, Future availability pending
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 512-774 Sq.
At the center of it all, these gorgeous South Park loft homes are steps from Giants Stadium, the Theater District and San Francisco Bay.
Hip and elegant, with custom finishes, spacious layouts, floor-to-ceiling windows and exposed brick walls, Arc Light offers unparalleled luxury in a friendly, sustainable apartment community
Elaborately landscaped roof decks offer year-round outdoor entertaining with grilling, lounge seating, custom stone and tile spa, and magnificent city views.
**Prices and specials are subject to change, please contact the leasing office for more info**

High speed data/voice wiring, Baths finished with custom cabinetry, honed limestone countertops, porcelain soaking tubs, oversized rainhead showers, vessel sinks and high-end fixtures, Bedrooms with distinctive wood and glass sliding wall panels and polished chrome, dual-head ceiling fans, Expansive windows with city views in many units, 10' ceilings with exposed brick in many units, Private outdoor balconies with sliding glass doors in many units, Washer and dryer, High gloss, color-dyed concrete floors, Custom window and shower treatments with stainless steel hardware, Central heating and cooling, Oversized 8' birch wood doors with stainless steel hardware, Custom lighting throughout, Gourmet kitchens with custom cabinetry, honed granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and high-end fixtures

Landscaped interior courtyards with exposed historic brick, integral concrete colored benches and dramatic uplighting, Pets welcome, Enclosed garage parking with controlled access, Two elaborately landscaped roof decks, featuring:, Storefront restaurant, Fitness center with roof deck views, Bicycle parking, Sun decks with lounge seating, Custom stone and tile spa, Grilling area, Enclosed dog run, Magnificent city views, Electric Car Charging Stations, Intercom door entry system, Turn-key management services, LEED™ for Homes Mid-rise Gold-Certified residential project, High speed elevators

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
